name: Zombie Escape Run
description:
The walking dead are wandering the streets and it’s up to YOU to beat them back! Take on the zombie apocalypse in ZOMBIE ESCAPE RUN!

- RUN through the city at night in this wacky 3D endless runner game! DASH forward and round corners at blistering speed!

- JUMP over dangerous obstacles straight from a Halloween nightmare! LEAP past crazy creatures and scary stuff!

- SLIDE under hazardous objects and collect power ups, coins and more! REACT fast to escape undead hordes with INVINCIBILITY POWERS and more!

- BASH zombies and leave them for dead! WHACK these shuffling corpses but watch out for WITCHES, BATS and CRAZY CRITTERS!

- COOL COSTUMES! Run as the Mafia, a Superhero, a Spaceman and even a CONEHEAD!

Zombie Escape Run is FREE to play! If you love slaying zombies, you’ll love Zombie Run!
